content: X-MC 5.6 Steel marking stamps Sharp-tipped, narrow special characters for stamping identification markings onto metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features A more efficient alternative to stamping letters and numbers onto steel by hand Helps increase user comfort, safety and productivity Faster and more reliable – 5 seconds per marking Use up to 10 characters at a time on the marking head Sharp-tipped contours – for stress-tolerant applications such as engraving hot steel, erectors, railcars, heavy equipment, utility poles and ships Applications Marking on metal surfaces for identification, traceability and quality control in steelworks, manufacturing plants, testing institutes, etc. Marking on slabs, blooms, billets and ingots as well as light-, medium- or heavy-duty steel sections ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Marking cold steel, Marking hot steel For use with (tools): DX 462 CM, DX 462 HM Character type: Sharp Technical Data | Application | Marking cold steel, Marking hot steel | For use with (tools) | DX 462 CM, DX 462 HM | Character type | Sharp | Character font height | 0.24 in | Base materials | Steel ### ITEMS- 7083 - Marking character X-MC S 5.6/10 dash - Package Size 1 pc - 8157 - Marking character X-MC LS 5.6/6 dash - Package Size 1 pc - 8159 - Marking character X-MC LS 5.6/6 point - Package Size 1 pc - 7084 - Marking character X-MC LS 5.6/6 space - Package Size 1 pc
